values.description: Put calendar spread is a combination of a longer-term (far-leg/front-month) put and a shorter-term (near-leg/back-month) put.
values.keywords: Put calendar spread option strategy, put horizontal spread, profits from a decrease in price movement, profits from the time decay value, profits from an increase in price movement, Strategy Payoff, limited-reward-limited-risk strategy, risk of early assignment, Naked long puts
